mean_cn: n.（宗教等的）仪式，例行公事，老规矩；  adj.作为仪式一部分的，例行的
mean_en: a series of actions that are always performed in the same way, especially as part of a religious ceremony; something that is done regularly and always in the same way
sentence: In some cultures, the ritual of baptism is practiced.
sentence_trans: 在一些文化中，人们有出生洗礼的仪式。
